definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

sentences.english: On the grounds of modern emergency medicine, defibrillation has to be performed in combination with CPR.
sentences.chinese: 根據現代急救理念，電除顫必須與心肺復甦聯合應用。

sentences.english: And Trump's governing concept shows a strong inclination toward neo-isolationism.
sentences.chinese: 從其執政理念看，新孤立主義傾向明顯。

sentences.english: Commitment to animal welfare issues and to promoting IFAW's mission.
sentences.chinese: 理解動物福利理念，並願意推動IFAW宗旨。

sentences.english: So, what was the concept Akon and Jackson tried to deliver on the song?
sentences.chinese: 那麼阿肯和傑克遜試圖通過這首歌傳遞什麼理念呢？

sentences.english: Anna's constant search for new ideas and challenges keeps her ahead of her times.
sentences.chinese: 對新理念與挑戰的不斷追求令安娜始終走在時代前列。

sentences.english: Senior middle school chemistry teaching should be conducted with the concept of new curriculum reform.
sentences.chinese: 高中化學教學需要用新課程改革的理念來統領。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the relationship between the truth perfect, beautiful life principle and university education.
sentences.chinese: 論述了求真求善求美的人生理念與大學教育的關係。

sentences.english: This paper examines a new concept of community-based tourism(CBET) that originated in foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 本文引入了國外基於社區的生態旅遊這一新發展理念。

sentences.english: Also, the whole concept of “goto hell” was abandoned.
sentences.chinese: 而且，“下地獄去吧”這樣的理念沒有了。

sentences.english: The concept and project status of design were introduced of ceiling curtain sound amplifying system for world trade building in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了世貿天階天幕擴聲系統的設計理念與工程概況。

sentences.english: Mediation priority, early prevention, public power dominant the social security are essential Countermeasure.
sentences.chinese: 讓公權力主導社會安全的理念深入人心是基本對策。

sentences.english: His idea ofalienation was derived mostly from Hegel.
sentences.chinese: 他的關於異化的理念絕大部分脫胎於黑格爾。

sentences.english: I hope some of those concepts come to market in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 我希望2010年這些理念能走向市場。

sentences.english: Tried-and-true methods mix with fresh concepts to create better wildland fleets .
sentences.chinese: 試用真實方法混合新鮮理念，創造出更好的荒地船隊。

sentences.english: At present, the theory of the Chinese subject have the newchanges.
sentences.chinese: 目前，語文學科教學理念有了新的變革。

sentences.english: At the same time, implementation of people-centered concept of curriculum leadership to achieve this requirement exactly.
sentences.chinese: 以人爲本的課程領導理念恰恰體現了這一要求。

definition: to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate
